title.rendered: Get Up Kid Package (Ticket + VIP) – Napoli

content.rendered:
• ONE (1) CAVEA BASSA RESERVED SEATED TICKET WITH EARLY ENTRY*
  • M&G WITH MARS
  • INDIVIDUAL PHOTO OP WITH MARS SHOT BY A PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHER**
  • PRE-SIGNED 2025 TOUR POSTER AUTOGRAPHED BY JARED AND SHANNON
  • EXCLUSIVE VIP MERCHANDISE WITH LAMINATE (NEW FOR 2025!)
  • PRE-DOORS TOUR MERCHANDISE SHOPPING OPPORTUNITY
  • ON SITE VIP CONCIERGE

* PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS AN ALL SEATED VENUE
** PHOTO WILL BE EMAILED WITHIN 72 HOURS OF SHOW

 

Check-in time and location will be emailed out by Adventures In Wonderland 3-5 days prior to the day of the show. Please check your spam folder! This information will also be posted on thirtysecondstomars.com prior to the show. Your ticket will be given to you at VIP check-in. All sales are final. Click here for complete Terms & Conditions.
